description: Team templates for Agent Teams — predefined compositions for common tasks

research-team.description: 3-agent team for research and synthesis tasks

members.name: researcher-1
members.role: Primary researcher — searches codebase, reads files, gathers raw data

members.name: researcher-2
members.role: Secondary researcher — parallel search path, different angle

members.name: synthesizer
members.role: Synthesizes findings from both researchers into coherent output

implementation-team.description: 4-agent team for feature implementation with architecture oversight

members.name: architect
members.role: Plans implementation approach, identifies files, reviews PRs

members.name: worker-1
members.role: Primary implementer — writes code, creates files

members.name: worker-2
members.role: Secondary implementer — parallel work on independent files

members.name: reviewer
members.role: Reviews completed work, runs tests, checks consistency

refactoring-team.description: 4-agent team for multi-file refactoring with F3 agents

members.name: orchestrator
members.role: Plans refactoring — analyzes deps, decomposes into atomic tasks

members.name: refactor-worker-1
members.role: Executes rename operations on assigned files

members.name: refactor-worker-2
members.role: Executes rename operations on assigned files (parallel)

members.name: checker
members.role: Validates results — checks for leftover refs, broken imports
